footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Understand the history, benefits, and sacred process of the Ayahuasca ceremony.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey of transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key. Find dietary recommendations, mental exercises, and tips to get the most out of your experience.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, receive spiritual content, and be part of our healing community.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew from the Amazon, created by combining two sacred plants. For centuries, it has been used in traditional ceremonies to facilitate deep healing, spiritual exploration, and a connection with a higher consciousness.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works by cleansing the body, mind, and spirit. Participants often experience visions, emotional release, and profound insights that help them resolve internal conflicts, heal past traumas, and gain a clearer understanding of their life's purpose.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: It is crucial to approach Ayahuasca with respect and a clear intention. It is not a recreational substance but a powerful spiritual tool that demands reverence and responsible guidance. Our ceremonies are led by experienced guides who ensure a safe and sacred environment for your journey.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to their deepest questions and a renewed sense of direction in life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release emotional blockages, heal past traumas, and find inner peace.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Deepen your connection with yourself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy enhances the healing process. Ideal for feeling the support of a community on the same path.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session designed for those seeking to work on specific or very deep issues with the exclusive attention of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Each of our guides brings a unique blend of experience, wisdom, and compassion, ensuring that your journey is held in a space of complete safety and trust.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Find the perfect space to begin or continue your journey of healing and self-discovery.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this time. Please check back soon.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: We're glad to have you! Please check your email to verify your account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage application content, users, and settings.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage, and communicate with all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear user, we would like to inform you that...
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire yet.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, respiratory issues)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, supplements, or regular over-the-counter drugs?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or worked with other psychoactive substances before?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to complete the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hola, te invitamos a completar tu cuestionario para la ceremonia.
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello, we invite you to complete your questionnaire for the ceremony.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp chat opened with the invitation message.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony's details.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Previous Events' section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Previous Events' section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from all users except admins. This action can be reversed.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view, reserve, and WhatsApp click counts for this ceremony to zero.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your space with a 20% deposit
authRequiredDescription: Please sign in to continue with your reservation.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Please sign in or create an account to view this content and continue your journey with us.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Please sign in or create an account to view our upcoming ceremonies and reserve your spot.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove this guide from the list.
editHeroVideoDescription: Change the main video on the homepage.
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please either select a video file or enter a video URL.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the Spiritual Guide from 'El Arte de Sanar'. How can I help you on your healing journey today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
themeCustomizationDescription: Customize the application's color palette. Changes are applied live for preview.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of all your data in a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Import data from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all current data in the application with the data from the selected file. This cannot be undone.
importSuccessDescription: Your data has been restored from the backup.
rollbackCardDescription: Something wrong with the import? You can roll back to the state right before you imported.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the data to the state it was in before the last import. This action cannot be undone.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to its previous state.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the AI guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review and manage system-generated error logs.
systemLogsDescription: A list of errors that have occurred in the application.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this log? This action cannot be undone.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a profound and transformative experience.
preparationProcessDescription: From intention to integration, each phase is crucial for your journey.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The central experience where the connection with the medicine takes place.
experienceProcessDescription: A journey of introspection, visions, and emotional and physical cleansing.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of applying the teachings received in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: Three days before and after the ceremony, we recommend a diet to cleanse your body and enhance your connection with the medicine.
allowedFoodsList: Vegetables, fruits, cereals (rice, quinoa), legumes, and water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, spicy food, fermented foods, alcohol, and drugs.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental state is fundamental. We suggest these practices:
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: Define what you want to heal or understand. Write it down and reflect on it.
reflectionDescription: Write about your fears, hopes, and expectations before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Be prepared to face and release deep emotions. The medicine is a mirror that reflects what needs to be healed. Trust the process and the guides who will accompany you with love and respect.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and well-being during the experience:
comfortItemsList: Comfortable clothing (white, if possible), blanket, pillow, and a change of clothes.
essentialsList: Water, a notebook and pen, and personal hygiene items.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your journey.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. This guide will remain available for you to consult at any time. We look forward to seeing you at the ceremony to begin this transformative journey together.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: A summary of the answers you provided.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for. You can review the details for each one.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not yet registered for any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events to find your next journey.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user should be enrolled in.
noActiveCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies available to assign.
